page.title: 10GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: GAMES WE PLAY ______________ We play a lot of games in school but the most popular is football.All the boys play football and we have a team that plays in the junior schools league.The girls play Netball and hockey.A new game we play is short tennis which you play with a softball and plastic rackets. During the Winter months we play mini-rugby which is another new game for us.Rugby used to be played by clubs in South Wales only,but now we have our own rugby club in Bethesda.Once a year we play "conkers"when we climb chesnut trees to find the best conkers.We also play marbles,but it is a craze thatnever lasts long.The girls play HOPSCOTCH on the yard and sing songs when they play ball.
